devdoc.author: Olugbenga Ayoola

addAdmin(address).details: maps the new address to true using mapping admin

params._admin: The address to be added as an admin

params._name: the name of the new product to be added.
params._price: The amount the product is going to be sold.
params._quantity: The quantity of the new product.
params._storeId: The id of the store to which the product is being added.

params._name: The name of the new store to be created.

addStoreOwner(address).details: maps the new address to true using mapping storeOwner.

params._address: The address of the store owner to be added.

buyProduct(uint256,uint256).details: deletes a product once the quantity is 0.

params._productId: The id of the product that is being bought.
params._quantity: The quantity of the product the shopper wants to buy.

params._newprice: The new price of the product.
params._productId: The id of the product whose price is being changed.

kill().details: sends all the ether in the contract to the owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAdmin(address).details: maps the new address to false using mapping admin

params._admin: The address of the admin to be removed

params._productId: The id of the product to be removed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._storeId: The id of the store whose products we want to get

returns._0: returns an integer array of the product ids.

params._owner: The address whose storeFronts we want to get

returns._0: returns an integer array of the store ids.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: The amount to withdraw from the store's balance.
params._id: The id of the store to withdraw from.

devdoc.title: A blockchain based market where goods can be bought and sold

addAdmin(address).notice: function to add a new admin

addProduct(string,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: allows a store owner to add a new product to the store.

addStoreFront(string).notice: allows a store owner to add a new store front.

addStoreOwner(address).notice: allows an admin to add a new store owner.

buyProduct(uint256,uint256).notice: allows a shopper to buy product from the store .

changePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: allows a store owner to change the price of a product.

methods.constructor: sets the address that deployed the contract as an admin.

kill().notice: allows the owner to kill contract

removeProduct(uint256).notice: allows a store owner to remove a product from the store.

toggleStopped().notice: Stops majority of the contract function in case of an emergency.Can only be activated by the owner.

withdrawFunds(uint256,uint256).notice: allows a store owner to withdraw funds from the store's balance.
